DOC.brief_summary: This is a multicenter, 1-year prospective, observational study of Atrial Fibrillation (AF) in Greece, designed to provide real world data regarding the characteristics of AF patients in Greece, as well as current clinical practices and adherence to the 2010 ESC guidelines.
DOC.brief_title: Current Clinical Practice in the Management of Atrial Fibrillation in Greece: the MANAGE-AF Study
